Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Houston in 1982...
Injured on 5/11/1983 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1985, off Dan Petry (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1985, off Roger Clemens (CHC)...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 4/18/1986 (Going to HOU: LF D. Justice, C M. Salas. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF L. Dykstra, 2B W. Backman, P D. Rozema)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF K. Gibson, P D. Stewart. Going to CHW: LF M. Greenwell, RF J. Buhner, CF L. Dykstra, P G. Swindell, 1B F. Stubbs)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1986, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (A) on 6/12/1987...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York (A) on 6/22/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 8/9/1988...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Texas on 5/12/1990 (Going to TEX: CF L. Dykstra. Going to CHW: C J. Flaherty, P J. Nelson)...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago (A) on 6/7/1991...
Traded from Texas to New York (N) on 2/5/1992 (Going to NYM: CF L. Dykstra, P M. Jackson. Going to TEX: CF M. Wilson, P W. Alvarez)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Cincinnati on 8/22/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1993, hitting .476 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1993, hitting .394 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/2/1994 to a 5-year deal worth $7,250,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1994, hitting .667 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 9/18/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1994, hitting .529 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1994, hitting .468 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Traded from Baltimore to New York (N) on 4/1/1995 (Going to NYM: CF L. Dykstra. Going to BAL: CF R. Freel)...
Injured on 5/9/1995 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1995, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 9/26/1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1995, hitting .464 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/13/1996, off Frank Viola (CIN)...
